summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3841 for the improvement of 28th Avenue South, from Charles Street to Norman Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47130, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
